title: Why do we write 1 as 1 and 2 as 2? - Quora

response.answer_text: Its okay. dont study this much. These are just symbols to signify quantity 1 means you have one quantity of anything. if our forefathers were weird they could have said Alpha means you have one quantity of anything. Its just simply a way of representation I hope you are a kid, otherwise you are totally drunk to ask this :P
